description: Try our easy to follow Arugula Salad With Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Arugula Salad With Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, and salt in a large non-metallic bowl. Add the arugula and toss together.
Arrange the arugula in a serving bowl. Use a vegetable peeler to shave curls of the Parmesan over the arugula. Add a generous amount of freshly ground pepper and serve.
